article_title: Uber Technologies Challenges French Court Ruling
article_text:
PARIS—Uber Technologies Inc. is challenging a French court ruling that deems one of its fastest-growing services to be illegal in France, escalating a fight amid the car-hailing company’s broader battles in Europe.

A Paris criminal court ruled Thursday that the San Francisco company’s new UberPop service, which connects passengers with drivers who don't have professional licenses, violates a prior decision that bans carpooling for...
